column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ iyi ekyir no Absalom siesiee tseaseanam na mpɔnkɔ maa noho
column3: na mbarimba eduonum a wɔbɛyɛ n’enyim abrampɔfo."
na okegyinaa kuropon ano kwan ho: na ɔbaa dɛ
column4: sɛ nyimpa biara nya asɛm bi a ɔgye dɛ ɔba ɔhen nkyɛn bedzi a
column7: Ifi ebɛn kurow do? Nna oebua dɛ
column8: W’akowaa fi Israel ebusuakuw ebusuakuw no mu bi mu."

column3: Hwɛ wo nsɛm ye na ɔtsen; na nyimpa bi nnyi hɔ a ɔhen etu no dɛ ontsie wo."
Ao kɛtseankyɛ wɔaahyɛ me asaase yi do ɔtsɛmbuafo
column4: ma nyimpa biara a ɔwɔ ebisadze bi anaa asɛm bi no ɔaaba mo hɔ

column3: sɛ nyimpa bi twe pin dɛ ɔbɛyɛ no enyidzi a

column2: "Na dɛm yi ara na Absalom dze yɛɛ Israel nyinara a wɔbaa ɔhen nkyɛn asɛndzi: nna Absalom dze wiawiaa Israel mbarimba no hɔn akoma."
"Na ɔbaa dɛ mfe anan ekyir no
column3: Absalom see ɔhen no dɛ
column5: ma monkɔ monkɔpon m’anohoba a mabɔ ama EWURADZE no

column2: "Osiandɛ aber a metse Gesur wɔ Siria no w’akowaa bɔɔ anohoba dɛ
column3: Sɛ EWURADZE dze me san ba Jerusalɛm ara ampa a
Kɔ asomdwee mu. Na Absalom sii mu kɔr Hebron."

column2: "Afei Absalom somasomaa abɔfo ma wɔkɔr Israel ebusuakuw ebusuakuw nyinara mu
column3: dɛ
column4: Sɛ hom tse abɛn ndze ara a

column2: "Na wɔpoon mbarimba ahaenu fi Jerusalɛm hyiae kaa Absalom ho ma wɔkɔree
column3: na hɔn dze
column4: wɔkɔr no dɛ hɔn tsirmu faa; nna wonnyim dza ɔrekɛyɛ no ho hwee."

column3: Gilonyi no
column7: mber a ɔrobɔ afɔr no. Na tsirdo apam no mu yɛɛ dzen; osiandɛ ɔman no kɔr do ara dɔree wɔ Absalom nkyɛn."

column3: dɛ

column2: "Na David see no nkowaa a wɔwɔ ne nkyɛn wɔ Jerusalɛm no nyinara dɛ
column3: Hom nsoɛr ma yenguan; ɔno bɛyɛ na hɛn mu biara emmfi Absalom nsa emmfi: hom nyɛ ntsɛm nsi mu nkɔ
column4: amma no ho aannyɛ har ɔammbɔto hɛn
column5: na ɔaammfa bɔn bi ammba hɛn do
column6: na ɔaammfa afona anomu ammbɔbɔ kurow yi."

column2: "Na ɔhen no nkowaa no see ɔhen dɛ
column3: Hwɛ
column4: wo nkowaa ayɛ krado dɛ yɛbɛyɛ biribiara a mo wura ɔhen bɛpɛ nyinara."

column3: na ne fiefo nyinara dzii n’ekyir. Na ɔhen no gyaa mbaa du a wɔyɛ nwewefo
na no nkowaa nyinara dzii n’ekyir; na woketsintsimii wɔ Bɛt-merhak."

column2: "Na no nkowaa no nyinara twaa mu wɔ ne nkyɛn kɔree; na Keretfo nyinara
column3: na Peletfo nyinara
column5: mbarimba ahaesia a wofi Gat bae bedzii n’ekyir no botwaa mu wɔ ɔhen no n’enyim."

column3: Gitinyi no dɛ
column4: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na wo so enye hɛn rokɔ? San kɔ
column5: na kɛtsena ɔhen no nkyɛn: na ɔwo yɛ ɔhɔho
column6: na ɔmantunyi so; san kɔ wankasa wo man mu."

column2: "Afei so ɔwoara ndeda yi ara na ebae
column3: na ndɛ memma enye hɛn nkɔ nkekyin
column4: hwɛ no dɛ morokɔ beebiara a mibenya makɔ yi? San na fa wo nuanom no san ekyir kɔ; mbɔbɔrhu na nokwar ndzi w’ekyir."

column2: "Na Itai buaa ɔhen no see dɛ
column3: Dɛ EWURADZE tse ase
column4: na mo wura ɔhen tse ase yi
column5: ampa beebiara mbrɛ mo wura ɔhen bɛtsena no
column8: mekyerɛ hɔ ara so na w’akowaa bɛtsena."

column3: Kɔ kotwa. Na Itai
column7: na mbofraba a wɔka no ho nyina."

column2: "Na ɔman no nyinara dze ndze kɛse sui
column3: na nkorɔfo no nyinara twaa mu kɔree: ɔhen no ankasa so twaa ɔwora Kidron no
column4: na nkorɔfo no nyinara twae kɛfaa sar no do kwan no do afamu."

column3: Zadok so
column4: na Levifo a wɔka no ho no nyinara
column5: so Nyankopɔn n’ahyɛmudaka no bae; na wɔsoɛɛ Nyankopɔn n’adakaa no sii famu
column6: na Abiathar fowee ma ɔman no nyinara fii kurow no mu twaa mu wiei ana."

column3: Soa Nyankopɔn n’adakaa no san kɔ kurow no mu: sɛ minya EWURADZE enyim enyimnyam a
Minnyi enyigye wɔ wo mu a; hwɛ
column5: ma ɔnyɛ me dɛ mbrɛ oye wɔ n’enyiwa do."

column2: "Eso ɔhen no see ɔsɔfo Zadok dɛ
column3: Ana nnyɛ adzehunyi nye wo bi a? San kɔ kurow no mu dwudwoodwo
column4: na hom mbabanyin beenu no nka hom ho

column3: mibetsintsim wɔ sar no do esutwaree no
column4: ma ekodu dɛ asɛm befi hom hɔ ebesi no pi ama me."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi Zadok na Abiathar soaa Nyankopɔn n’adakaa no baa Jerusalɛm: na wɔtsenaa hɔ."
"Na David nam Ngo Koko no afowee kɔree; na mbrɛ ɔrokɔ no na orusu; na ɔakata ne tsir do
column3: na ɔnantseew anamɔnkwaa mu: na nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ ne nkyɛn no nyinara mu nyimpa biara kataa ne tsir do
dɛ
column4: Ahithofel wɔ Absalom nkyɛn tsirdo apamfo no mu. Na David see dɛ
column6: meserɛ wo dan Ahithofel n’apam nkwaseasɛm."

column3: aber a David dur afowee no etsifi mbrɛ wɔsɔr Nyankopɔn no
Sɛ ɔwo enye me twa kɔ a

column2: "na mbom sɛ esan kɔ kurow no mu
column3: na ekɛse Absalom dɛ
column5: mebɛyɛ w’akowaa dɛ mbrɛ nkan no meyɛɛ w’egya n’akowaa no
column6: dɛmara so na afei mebɛyɛ w’akowaa a: ɔno na ebɛsɛɛ Ahithofel n’apam no ama me."

column2: "Na ana innyi asɔfo Zadok na Abiathar wɔ wo nkyɛn hɔ bi a? Dɛm ntsi ɔmbra dɛ asɛm biara a ebɛtse no wɔ ɔhen no ne fie no
column3: ka kyerɛ asɔfo Zadok na Abiathar."
wɔwɔ hɔn mbabanyin beenu no wɔ hɔn nkyɛn hɔ
column5: na Abiathar ne babanyin Jonatan; na asɛm biara a hom bɛtse no
column6: hom nsoma ma wɔmfa ndua hɔn do ndu me nkyɛn."

column2: "Nna David ne nyɛnko Husai sanee baa kurow no mu; na Absalom so baa Jerusalɛm."
